name: Follow
description: Follow the movement of another object, either by time or distance.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The mode to compare to.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: The comparison to use.

params.name: Delay
params.description: The delay to compare to.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: The comparison to use.

params.name: Max delay
params.description: The maximum delay to compare to.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: The comparison to use.

params.name: History rate
params.description: The history rate to compare to.

conditions.name: Is following property
conditions.description: Test if a particular property is enabled for following.

params.name: Property
params.description: The property to test if enabled for following.

conditions.name: Is following custom property
conditions.description: Test if a particular custom property is enabled for following.

params.name: Custom property
params.description: A string identifying the custom property.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is currently enabled.

conditions.name: Is following object
conditions.description: Test if currently actively following an object.

conditions.name: Has follow data
conditions.description: Test if enough data has been recorded for the object to start following.

conditions.name: Is paused
conditions.description: Test if following is currently paused.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The mode to set.

actions.name: Set delay
actions.description: Set the current follow delay (time or distance, depending on the mode).

params.name: Delay
params.description: The time in seconds, or distance in pixels, to follow (depending on the mode).

actions.name: Set max delay
actions.description: Set the current maximum delay (time or distance, depending on the mode).

params.name: Max delay
params.description: The maximum time/distance data to remember.

actions.name: Set history rate
actions.description: Set the rate at which the followed object properties are saved.

params.name: History rate
params.description: The rate in entries per second at which to remember changes in the followed object.

actions.name: Set following property
actions.description: Set whether a property is being followed.

params.name: Property
params.description: The property to set whether being followed.

params.name: Enabled
params.description: Whether to follow the chosen property.

actions.name: Set property interpolation
actions.description: Set the type of interpolation used between history entries.

params.name: Property
params.description: The property to set interpolation for.

params.name: Interpolation
params.description: The interpolation mode to use for the property.

actions.name: Start following custom property
actions.description: Add a custom property to be followed.

params.name: Custom property
params.description: A string identifying the custom property.

params.name: Interpolation
params.description: The interpolation mode to use for the property.

params.name: Custom property
params.description: A string identifying the custom property.

actions.name: Set custom property value
actions.description: Set the current value of a custom property being followed.

params.name: Custom property
params.description: A string identifying the custom property.

params.name: Value
params.description: A number or string to set as the current value of this custom property.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

params.name: Object
params.description: The object to follow.

params.name: From current position
params.description: If enabled, this object will immediately follow starting from its current position.

actions.name: Follow self
actions.description: Start remembering the history of the object this behavior belongs to.

actions.name: Stop following
actions.description: Stop following any currently followed object.

actions.name: Clear history
actions.description: Clear the remembered history of the object being followed, starting over from scratch.

actions.name: Rewind history
actions.description: Seek to an earlier time in history to continue recording from there.

params.name: Time
params.description: The time in seconds to rewind through history.

params.name: Paused
params.description: Whether to pause following.

actions.name: Load history JSON
actions.description: Load the saved history of the followed object from a JSON string.

params.name: JSON
params.description: A string of history JSON data, from the 'HistoryAsJSON' expression.

expressions.name: Delay
expressions.description: The current delay in seconds or pixels.

expressions.name: MaxDelay
expressions.description: The current maximum delay in seconds or pixels.

expressions.name: HistoryRate
expressions.description: The current history rate in entries per second.

expressions.name: FollowUID
expressions.description: The UID of the currently followed object (or -1 if none).

expressions.name: DelayedCustomPropertyValue
expressions.description: The delayed value of a custom property being followed.

params.name: CustomProperty
params.description: A string identifying the custom property.

expressions.name: HistoryAsJSON
expressions.description: Save the history of the followed object to a string of JSON data.

params.name: MaxDelay
params.description: Max time in seconds of history to save.
